title: Australia's South32 quarterly coking coal output rises 8%
text:
Australia's South32 quarterly coking coal output rises 8%

Stock Markets 53 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 00:24)

© Reuters. Australia's South32 quarterly coking coal output rises 8% Oct 17 (Reuters) - South32 Ltd on Thursday posted an 8% rise in coking coal production for the first quarter, as the miner ramped up output at its Illawarra project in New South Wales. Production of the steel-making ingredient, known as metallurgical or coking coal, was about 1.7 million tonnes in the September quarter, compared with 1.5 million tonnes a year earlier. (https:// at Illawarra, South32's biggest source of coal, rose about 9%.

Australia's South32 quarterly coking coal output rises 8%
